channel.title: Adding an item and equipting it {PI}
channel.description: ok so what I'm trying to do is, trying to make a cape equipped to the player when he teleports/moves into a different area and the player cannot remove it, Kinda like a castle wars thing. So please help I have been looking all over for a code like so and it is of great importance.

item.title: Adding an item and equipting it {PI}
item.dc:creator: @yo_dude_1345 yo dude 1345
item.description:
@yo_dude_1345 wrote:

hm I’ve looked through multiple castle wars topics and even my own within my server and I haven’t found anything that would impose that you cannot take a cape off while in game. Hm… kinda weird but please do help o.O

Read full topic
item.source: Adding an item and equipting it {PI}

item.title: Adding an item and equipting it {PI}
item.dc:creator: @SacredHeart SacredHeart
item.description:
@SacredHeart wrote:

Rip it from the castle wars code, you pretty much answered it yourself.

But here:

if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerCape] > 0) { c.sendMessage("Your not aloud to were Capes in the area, sorry!"); return; }

Read full topic
item.source: Adding an item and equipting it {PI}
